enchantment.usefulspyglass.marking.desc: Pressing the attack keybind marks mobs viewed through a spyglass.
enchantment.usefulspyglass.precision.des: Offhanding a spyglass and crouching while using a ranged weapon grants zoom. Projectiles gain perfect accuracy and deal extra damage.
enchantment.usefulspyglass.spotter.desc: Pressing the attack keybind while looking through a spyglass summons an eye of ender to constantly mark entities near the targeted position.
